title: Drawing, "His Life-Line Is Your Red Cross, American Red Cross", January 7, 1944
signed: Signed in violet gouache, lower right: Rough by / E. McKnight Kauffer / 1/7/44
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: In the center, an open hand with a red cross on it against a dark brown ground. Title in yellow above: HIS LIFE-LINE IS; below in white: YOUR RED CROSS.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "His Life-Line Is Your Red Cross, American Red Cross", January 7, 1944.
January 7, 1944. Brush and gouache on paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-598.
